title: warwick rework
body:
Ã­ don't like my skin anymore from warwick can i ask for a refund?
{{champion:19}}

replies.body: They have already stated that they are fixing hyena warwicks skins now chill out.

> [{quoted}](name=Karn Bishop,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HirvXQ79,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-13T00:27:17.052+0000)
>
> They have already stated that they are fixing hyena warwicks skins now chill out.

Who cares what they are doing they are changing the things I bought. I don't like what they are doing thus I would not have bought them in the first place if they were made like this back then. They owe me

well they don't and if they didn't do updates because a small group of people complained I would still be killing you with 40 second invisibility that has a 4.5 second stun as eve while you cry tears of terror begging riot to make the terror end.

You can refund unlocked content as long as you have tokens and it was obtained within the last 90 days, per the [refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guidelines.  [Champion rework refunds](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h5) are not something that's currently offered.  Let me know if that clears things up!
